subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Basketball
lead_paragraph: A judge in New Jersey will consider on Monday whether the former N.B.A. star Jayson Williams should be sentenced for covering up a fatal shooting at his mansion in 2002.
snippet: A judge in New Jersey will consider on Monday whether the former N.B.A. star Jayson Williams should be sentenced for covering up a fatal shooting at his mansion in 2002.
